attributes.action: Increase broadband network capacity across the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are at a broadband turning point in the UK. So many fast home connections, with ADSL2+ becoming more and more aailable, and so few backbones; this is going to become a problem sooner rather than later!

I propose the Prime Minister look into extending fat-pipe connectivity across the board, and specifically to IP ranges dedicated to news and technology websites (for example, HardOCP, ZDNet and other such news channels).

A solid broadband base is required for this country's expansion and we need to retain our position as a world leader in technology and innovation; for this reason I propose action on the PM's part.
